author: Joseph Goodman | jgoodman@al.com
title: Alabama OC Steve Sarkisian speaks with reporters for first time since promotion
text: Tasked with the role of Alabama offensive coordinator on short notice, Sarkisian spoke with reporters on Saturday for the first time since being fired in 2015 from the University of Southern California. Alabama and Clemson participated in the championship game's Media Day on Saturday at Amalie Arena in Tampa, and Sarkisian's appearance dominated the event.
